capabilities.name: get_tracks_info
capabilities.description: Get tracks info from midi file

capabilities.name: get_track_info_by_index
capabilities.description:
Get track info from midi file by track index. 
    name, instrument, channel, endOfTrackTicks, duration, durationTicks, noteCount

capabilities.name: get_notes_by_index
capabilities.description: Get notes from midi file by track index

capabilities.name: get_pitchbends_by_index
capabilities.description: Get pitchbends from midi file by track index

capabilities.name: get_controlchanges_by_index
capabilities.description: Get controlchanges from midi file by track index

capabilities.name: add_notes_by_index
capabilities.description: Add notes to midi file by track index

capabilities.name: add_controlchanges_by_index
capabilities.description: Add controlchanges to midi file by track index

capabilities.name: add_pitchbends_by_index
capabilities.description: Add pitchbends to midi file by track index

capabilities.name: add_track
capabilities.description: Add a new track to midi file and return the new track info
